title: Heathrow Airport expansion
description: All the latest news about Heathrow Airport expansion from the BBC
content:
It's one of the most controversial planning decisions the UK has witnessed in recent times.

And residents and politicians have continued to have their say both for and against the third runway, which was given the go-ahead by MPs last night.

Colnbrook resident Peter Short, who lives in the middle of the proposed expansion site, has lived in the area for 40 years with his family.

He added: "Having to find somewhere else and start life all over again is something I'm not looking forward to."

Sheila, from the Colnbrook Residents Association, said: "The noise is horrendous.

"The planes were still landing past midnight last night and started again at half past four this morning so sleep becomes very difficult."
